tasks.task: Update strawberry varieties for the state's specialty crop market.
subtasks: Evaluate yield and berry size of new varieties.
Introduce collaboratively adapted varieties (e.g., Camarosa, Camino Real).
Highlight experimental results (e.g., Fronteras, Ruby June).
Assess honeybee activity and strawberry pollination.
Adjust planting techniques based on variety needs.
Adapt to environmental factors (e.g., freeze events with row covers).
